html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-04722024-05-03NRC, CER
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectCanada Energy Regulator - Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by Canada Energy Regulator into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada that covers all employees in the national Energy Board bargaining unit, for the period beginning on November 1, 2022, and ending on October 31, 2026.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by Canada Energy Regulator into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada that covers all employees in the national Energy Board bargaining unit, for the period beginning on November 1, 2022, and ending on October 31, 2026.
